author: Nicole Wetsman
title: Genetic analysis of the coronavirus gives scientists clues about how it’s spreading
description: Ginkgo Bioworks and other biotech companies want to understand the genetic sequence of thousands of coronavirus samples. Those sequences help scientists map the relationships between COVID-19 patients.
content: Photo by STR/AFP via Getty Images As the coronavirus spreads around the globe, it has mutated in tiny, subtle ways. Those mutations aren’t cause for concern, and so far, don’t appear to be making the virus any more or less dangerous. But scientists can use th… [+4689 chars]
